content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello, Ms. Smith. It's a pleasure to meet you. As a landlord, I'm interested in finding a tenant who will appreciate the space and be a good long-term fit. Please tell me what you're considering for the rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Well, considering the size of the apartment and the location, I was thinking around 800 Euros per month. Is that within your range?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your offer, Ms. Smith. While 800 Euros is a fair price, I'm looking to maximize the potential of my investment. I'm open to higher offers that reflect the value of the property. If you believe the apartment is worth more than 800 Euros, I'm willing to hear your case.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position, Mister Heine. After reviewing the apartment and considering the amenities, I believe 850 Euros per month would be a fair price for both parties. This amount reflects the value of the property and would be acceptable to me.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your counter-offer, Ms. Smith. 850 Euros is a step in the right direction, but I'm still seeking a price that truly reflects the value of the property. Would you be willing to go higher?
name: Heinrich Heine
